guards.private: Only you can view this session.
guards.link: Anyone with the link can view.

home.title: Train smarter. Share progress. Celebrate consistency.
home.description: Plan, log, and analyse your training with coach‑ready detail. Track streaks, compare blocks, and spot recovery trends with zero fluff.
home.subtitleOnlineFallback: API connection healthy — ready when you are.
home.subtitleOffline: Working offline. Your changes will sync when the server returns.
home.subtitleChecking: Verifying API health and warming caches…
home.chartDescription: Seven‑day completion rate across planned sessions.

login.title: Welcome back. Keep your streak going.
login.description: We rotate tokens and enforce session hygiene so your account stays secure.
login.error: We couldn’t verify your credentials. Please try again.

register.title: Create your account
register.description: Set up your profile, training preferences, and privacy defaults. Sensitive data is private by default.
register.successDescription: We’ve sent a verification link. Click it to activate your account.
register.error: We couldn’t create your account. Please try again shortly.

profile.title: Preferences, privacy, and performance goals.
profile.description: Set default visibility, preferred units, and personal best targets so every shared session tells your story.

visibility.title: Visibility
visibility.description: Default session visibility: Followers. Switch to Public for competition recaps.

units.title: Preferred units
units.description: Weight in kilograms • Distance in kilometers • Pace in min/km.

achievements.title: Signature achievements
achievements.description: Back squat 180 kg • Bench 115 kg • Deadlift 210 kg • Boston Marathon qualifier.

share.title: Share links
share.description: Create personal share links for coaches or judges. Revoke access instantly at any time.

guards.active: Share this URL only with people you trust.

feed.title: Share progress with teammates and followers.
feed.description: Private work stays private. Public achievements are discoverable and easy to celebrate.

leah.note: New 5RM deadlift at 170 kg — grip work is paying off!

marco.note: Shared a deload plan with ankle‑rehab protocol.

team.note: Weekly leaderboard: Emma reclaimed #1 with 98 streak points.

footer.note: Built for athletes who love data‑driven progress — Fitvibe

errors.WEAK_PASSWORD: Password must be at least 12 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, digit, and symbol
errors.PASSWORD_CONTAINS_EMAIL: Password cannot contain your email address
errors.AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED: Your verification link has expired. Please request a new one
errors.AUTH_TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Verification limit reached. Please try again later
errors.AUTH_INVALID_SCOPE: Specify a sessionId or revoke scope
errors.USER_USERNAME_INVALID: Username must be 3–50 characters and may include letters, numbers, dots, underscores, and dashes
errors.EXERCISE_DUPLICATE: Exercise name already exists in this library scope
errors.EXERCISE_FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to modify this exercise
errors.SESSION_INVALID_SOURCE: Source session has an invalid planned date
errors.FEED_AUTH_REQUIRED: Authentication required for the requested feed
errors.FEED_NOT_OWNER: You do not own this session
errors.FEED_INVALID_STATUS: Only completed sessions can be shared
errors.FEED_INVALID_EXPIRES_AT: expiresAt must be a valid ISO date
errors.POINTS_INVALID_LIMIT: Limit must be a positive integer
errors.POINTS_INVALID_FROM: From must be a valid ISO timestamp
errors.POINTS_INVALID_TO: To must be a valid ISO timestamp
errors.IDEMPOTENCY_MISMATCH: Idempotency key already used with a different payload
errors.IDEMPOTENCY_INVALID: Idempotency-Key header must not be empty

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 12 characters long
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must include a lowercase letter
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must include an uppercase letter
validation.usernameFormat: Username may only contain letters, numbers, underscores, dots, or dashes

dashboard.title: Your training command centre
dashboard.description: Monitor streaks, readiness, and leaderboard changes at a glance. Metrics update in real time after sync or manual logs.
dashboard.errorRefresh: Couldn’t refresh analytics. Showing the last snapshot.
dashboard.helperText: Showing up to 5 periods to keep shared dashboards fast.

progress.title: Visualise progression with context
progress.description: Compare volume, velocity, and readiness across blocks to see how programming changes drive results.
progress.noExerciseData: No exercise data for this period

verifyEmail.descVerifying: Please wait while we verify your email address.
verifyEmail.descSuccess: Your email has been verified. Redirecting to login…
verifyEmail.descFailed: We couldn’t verify your email. The link may have expired or is invalid.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.descSuccess: If an account exists for that email, we sent reset instructions.
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email and we’ll send a reset link.
forgotPassword.successMessage: Check your email for the password reset link.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.descSuccess: Your password was reset. Redirecting to login…
resetPassword.successText: You can now log in with your new password.
resetPassword.invalidToken: Invalid reset token. Please request a new one.

logger.title: Capture every rep without breaking flow.
logger.description: Track sets, load, tempo, and RPE. Sync with wearables or log manually—your data stays coach‑ready.

planner.title: Design training blocks with intent.
planner.description: Drag, duplicate, and periodise workouts. Planner keeps intensity, volume, and deload ratios on target.

sessions.title: Plan and log your workouts
sessions.description: Design training blocks and capture every rep without breaking flow.

insights.title: Your performance dashboard
insights.description: Monitor readiness, visualise progression, and track your journey with data-driven insights.

notFound.title: We couldn’t find that page.
notFound.description: The route is private or not yet available. Return to the dashboard or contact the team for early access.

maintenanceBanner.message: The system is in read-only mode. Write operations are disabled.
